Francis Smith

  1. Foster Name: Francis Dolej
  2. Alternate Foster Name: Dolyes
  3. Foster Family: Albert and Josephine Dolej
  4. Foster Family Alt: Dolejs
  5. Location of Family: Dodge County, NE
  6. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  7. Arrival Place: Unknown
  8. Age on Arrival: 2
  9. Date of Birth: 10/24/1910, NY
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: OTR, 81; Interview done by Toni Weiler from her collection; Historical News, December 1980; 1920 United States Federal Census.
